name: LinarenaBP
article: Blockchain is the most famous technology these days. But it is difficult for people to appreciate the real value of blockchain technology with the amount of entry level hurdles for users and developers. For users it takes too long to make real purchases with cryptocurrency.  Users also need to take too many steps to utilize a coin.  For developers, they must learn new and difficult programming languages. It's hard to experience the value of blockchain in our life.
slogan: We’re shifting to a blockchain era from the internet
